about_the_game:
Missed out on the Valentines event back in February, and you don't want to wait for it to roll back around next year? This pass will permanently re-activate the valentines update and unlock Giga for good, allowing you to go back to the old-school endless board and give Giga's size-shifting abilities a spin. Includes the following:

- Access to the Valentines event board (it's in the event tab)

- Permanent and immediate access to Gigandra Buildwiser, the size-shifter who can grow and shrink at the push of a button.

Warning: This DLC pass exists exclusively to re-enable access to the event for those who have missed out on it and don't want to wait until next year for it to return. The Valentines event lasts from February 14th to February 28th every year, be sure to check the current time and date before purchasing this DLC so that you don't end up spending money on something you don't need. This DLC will not provide any benefits that can't be gained in the base game whenever the event returns every February.

name: Dimension Quest Pinball Event Pass - Lovely Valentines

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Dimension Quest Pinball Event Pass - Lovely Valentines

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 10, 11
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Much like the base game, this can be run on almost anything.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A pass to bring back the Lovely Valentines event, giving you access to Giga and the event board not just for a few weeks, but forever! For purchase by anyone that missed the event.
